body:
Hey guys!

It's been a while since I've done a discussion starter/chat cafe, due to the fact that I have had finals all this week, and studying and lots of homework! Now that school's over, I'm going to make a holiday themed D.S! So here's today's question; What is something that you extremely want for christmas? *note if you celebrate some other holiday such as hanukah, you can write what you want as well! I hope you all are having a great holiday break so far! (for those who are in school) I'm going to try and be active for the break, but most likely will not :P. Happy Holidays! Merry Christmas! Happy new year! #2015!

Peace, 

Canuck

title: Discussion starter!!!

replies.body: I really want an oDroid-XU3 for christmas! Other than that, I'm not that worried.

replies.body: Tickets to WF because I'm too cheap to buy them.
